subject: Audacity help pls
author: Kristin
full_text:
I downloaded Audacity and it works fine.  But I need to download the
.dll & the .vst programs to be able to save to MP3 format.  My system
will not accept the .dll zip.  Is there a free program out there that
works with WIN XP that will allow me to save .dll & .vst files?

Thanks for your help,
k
